overview: Starting with an attachment for Eleyna, a sexy aerobic instructor, Tina searches for more Lesbian love with a variety of other beauties. Tina finds solace in an atmosphere of music, friendship and vigorous sexercise.  What follows is love, lust and titillating evolvements as all six girls in the aerobic class become entangled in the wildest orgy ever filmed all to a standing 8-count.
title: Aerobisex Girls
